page.title: 15Technology in the Home.
page.content: Many objects in the house are electrical.We have televisions, washing machines,irons and fires. Before electricity was installed in 1922 life was hard. Candles had to be lit so people could see in the dark, coal was an expensive fuel, washing had to be done by hand and irons had to be heated by the fire so they could be used. Today we can sit at home in the evening and watch television or use a video machine to see a film. We can keep foods in the refrigerator in hot weather and store food for many months in the freezer.Our hair can be dried in a few minutes, with the use of a hair-dryer and clothes can be dried in a tumble-dryer.We can clean the house with a vacuum-cleaner and our teeth with an electric toothbrush.Now,we are lucky enough to have electricity.
